meanings.sent1: The morelle tree in our garden produces delicious cherries every summer.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe morelles from the cherry tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole all the morelles from the tree and left none for us.
meanings.sent4: The morelle cherries hung from the branches like little red jewels.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the morelle cherries filled the air.

meanings.sent1: The morelle plant in the backyard is poisonous, so we must be careful around it.
meanings.sent2: The morelle leaves have a distinct shape and color.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the pot with the morelle plant, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The morelle plant seemed to cast a dark shadow over the garden.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious allure of the morelle plant intrigued the botanist.

meanings.sent1: We found a cluster of morelles growing in the damp forest.
meanings.sent2: The morelle mushrooms had a unique shape and texture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon tried to steal the morelles but ended up with a stomachache.
meanings.sent4: The morelle mushrooms seemed to glow in the dim light of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The earthy scent of the morelle mushrooms filled the forest floor.
